name: Fa Mulan
info:
• 简体中文名: 花木兰
  • 别名: 花木蘭
  • 性别: 女
  • 引用来源: disney.fandom.com/wiki/Fa_Mulan
  • CV: 温明娜(speaking), Lea Salonga (singing)
detail:
Fa Mulan is the titular protagonist of Disney's 1998 animated feature film of the same name. She is the strong-willed and tenacious daughter of a war veteran, who strives to uphold her family's honor. When her father is called back into battle to defend China from Shan Yu, Mulan opts to protect him by taking his place under the guise of a male soldier named Ping.

Mulan is inspired by the legendary Hua Mulan from the Chinese poem The Ballad of Hua Mulan. She is the eighth official Disney Princess and only current one who is not actually royalty through either birth or marriage.

While her name is "Fa Mulan" in the Disney film, in the actual Chinese legend her name is "Hua Mulan", though they are both pronounced similarly (Fa being Cantonese).
